name: Easter Crazy - Free Swap & Match Eggs Puzzle Mania
name_original: Easter Crazy - Free Swap & Match Eggs Puzzle Mania
description:
Easter Crazy - Free Swap & Match Eggs Puzzle Mania is a puzzle game developed by Jochen De Schepper. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by SmileyGamer.
Easter Crazy - Free Swap & Match Eggs Puzzle Mania is available on iOS.
